Registering AmIRC

AmIRC is no longer being sold and the registration free version does not work seem to work with AmiTCP. AmIRC can be found on the NetConnect CD 3.1 from Haage & Partner along with a key generator that registers all programs provided on the CD. In order to regiter AmIRC, copy the netconnect library from LIBS: from the NetConnect CD to the workbench LIBS: directory and launch AmIRC from the CD. A registration form should pop up requesting a serial. The serial is the following: 

01358-yw6sf-cxhbh-p75tb-kazdn-xrmhb-
iro7l-jdd7l-umgpn-huclj-6514h-ocneh-
guukj-yputf-amb7d-rtphg-ljlkn-98641
